content: hello this is my new pattern for shawl called duna there are 3 versions of duna shawl in this pattern * **duna original** classical triangle symmetric shawl 1st picture coral color pattern contains both chart and written pattern this shawl is reversible looks the same from both sides * **duna asymmetric** pattern chart * **duna 2** another version of duna original 2nd picture - green color there are added 2 post stitches stripes into the pattern pattern chart i hope you will like it please do not hesitate to contact me in the case of problems if you like my patterns feel free to join my fb group https //www facebook com/groups/2760769384151530/ you can find there all info about my patterns also news and some gifts
